018package com.fluidops.fedx.cache;
019
020import info.aduna.iteration.CloseableIteration;
021import info.aduna.iteration.EmptyIteration;
022
023import java.io.BufferedInputStream;
024import java.io.BufferedOutputStream;
025import java.io.File;
026import java.io.FileInputStream;
027import java.io.FileOutputStream;
028import java.io.ObjectInputStream;
029import java.io.ObjectOutputStream;
030import java.util.Collections;
031import java.util.HashMap;
032import java.util.List;
033
034import org.apache.log4j.Logger;
035import org.openrdf.model.Statement;
036
037import com.fluidops.fedx.exception.EntryAlreadyExistsException;
038import com.fluidops.fedx.exception.EntryUpdateException;
039import com.fluidops.fedx.exception.FedXException;
040import com.fluidops.fedx.exception.FedXRuntimeException;
041import com.fluidops.fedx.structures.Endpoint;
042import com.fluidops.fedx.structures.SubQuery;
043
044
045/**
046 * A simple implementation of a Main memory cache which is persisted to the provided cache location.
047 * 
048 * Currently only binary provenance information is maintained.
049 * 
050 * @author Andreas Schwarte
051 *
052 */
053public class MemoryCache implements Cache {
054
055        public static Logger log = Logger.getLogger(MemoryCache.class);
056        
057        protected HashMap<SubQuery, CacheEntry> cache = new HashMap<SubQuery, CacheEntry>();
058        protected String cacheLocation;
059        
060        public MemoryCache(String cacheLocation) {
061                if (cacheLocation==null)
062                        throw new FedXRuntimeException("The provided cacheLocation must not be null.");
063                this.cacheLocation = cacheLocation;
064        }
065        
066        @Override
067        public void addEntry(SubQuery subQuery, CacheEntry cacheEntry) throws EntryAlreadyExistsException {
068
069                synchronized (cache) {
070                        
071                        if (cache.containsKey(subQuery))
072                                throw new EntryAlreadyExistsException("Entry for statement " + subQuery + " already exists in cache. Use update functionality instead.");
073                
074                        cache.put(subQuery, cacheEntry);
075                }
076                
077        }
078        
079        
080        @Override
081        public void updateEntry(SubQuery subQuery, CacheEntry merge) throws EntryUpdateException {
082                
083                synchronized (cache) {
084                        
085                        CacheEntry entry = cache.get(subQuery);
086                        
087                        if (entry==null)
088                                cache.put(subQuery, merge);
089                        else
090                                entry.merge(merge);
091                }
092                
093        }
094
095
096        @Override
097        public void removeEntry(SubQuery subQuery) throws EntryUpdateException {
098                
099                synchronized (cache) {
100                        cache.remove(subQuery);
101                }
102                
103        }
104        
105        @Override
106        public StatementSourceAssurance canProvideStatements(SubQuery subQuery, Endpoint endpoint) {
107                CacheEntry entry = cache.get(subQuery);
108                if (entry == null)
109                        return StatementSourceAssurance.POSSIBLY_HAS_STATEMENTS;
110                if (entry.hasLocalStatements(endpoint))
111                        return StatementSourceAssurance.HAS_LOCAL_STATEMENTS;
112                return entry.canProvideStatements(endpoint);
113        }
114
115        
116        @Override
117        public CacheEntry getCacheEntry(SubQuery subQuery) {
118                CacheEntry entry = cache.get(subQuery);
119                // TODO use clone or some copy/wrapping method to have read only capability
120                return entry;
121        }
122
123        @Override
124        public CloseableIteration<? extends Statement, Exception> getStatements(
125                        SubQuery subQuery) {
126                CacheEntry entry = cache.get(subQuery);
127                return entry == null ? new EmptyIteration<Statement, Exception>() : entry.getStatements();
128        }
129
130        @Override
131        public CloseableIteration<? extends Statement, Exception> getStatements(
132                        SubQuery subQuery, Endpoint endpoint) {
133                CacheEntry entry = cache.get(subQuery);
134                return entry == null ? new EmptyIteration<Statement, Exception>() : entry.getStatements(endpoint);
135        }
136
137        @Override
138        public List<Endpoint> hasLocalStatements(SubQuery subQuery) {
139                CacheEntry entry = cache.get(subQuery);
140                return entry == null ? Collections.<Endpoint>emptyList() : entry.hasLocalStatements();
141        }
142
143        @Override
144        public boolean hasLocalStatements(SubQuery subQuery, Endpoint endpoint) {
145                CacheEntry entry = cache.get(subQuery);
146                return entry == null ? false : entry.hasLocalStatements(endpoint);
147        }
148
149        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
150        @Override
151        public void initialize() throws FedXException {
152                File f = new File(cacheLocation);
153                
154                if (!f.exists())
155                        return;
156                try {
157                        ObjectInputStream in = new ObjectInputStream( new BufferedInputStream( new FileInputStream(f)));
158                        cache = (HashMap<SubQuery, CacheEntry>)in.readObject();
159                        in.close();
160                } catch (Exception e) {
161                        throw new FedXException("Error initializing cache.", e);
162                }
163        }
164
165        @Override
166        public void invalidate() throws FedXException {
167                ;       // no-op                
168        }
169
170        @Override
171        public void persist() throws FedXException {
172                
173                // XXX write to a temporary file first, to prevent a corrupt file
174                
175                try {
176                        ObjectOutputStream out = new ObjectOutputStream( new BufferedOutputStream( new FileOutputStream( new File(cacheLocation))));
177                        out.writeObject(this.cache);
178                        out.flush();
179                        out.close();    
180                } catch (Exception e) {
181                        throw new FedXException("Error persisting cache data.", e);
182                }
183        }
184
185        @Override
186        public void clear() {
187                log.info("Clearing the cache.");
188                cache = new HashMap<SubQuery, CacheEntry>();
189                
190        }
191
192
193
194
195}
